author: bayard
msg: Applying Jason Madden's patch from LANG-334 to provide enums.Enum with optimized thread safety. As Jason's used this in production I think it's fair to use it rather than the simpler Collections.synchronizedMap(..). I've also applied the patch to the enum.Enum
